name: Gura's Birthday
description:
Note - I wanted to make a game that's playable in a browser, but unfortunately chromium based browsers seem to have some problems with the audio. If it bothers you, you can download the game or play it in Firefox. (Or just mute the audio)

The goal of this game is to eat as much cake (and shrimp) as you can, while avoiding anything else. Eating a shrimp will protect you from one hit, and you'll get more points for each shrimp you eat without getting hit. Oh, and you can eat Bloop too, if you catch him outside of his bubble.

This game is over a month late, but it was made to celebrate Gura's birthday. Happy Birthday, Gura! She (and Hololive) still have a lot of things to celebrate.

Controls

Move:  WASD / Arrow Keys / D-pad

Pause: Escape / Start 

Mute / unmute audio: M / Select

Credits

Everything made by me.

Disclaimer

This fangame is made under Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement. I think it would be pretty cool if you watched their streams.
